content:
# I successfully extracted 3 additional iron plates from the new furnace, bringing my total to 4 iron plates in the inventory. The furnace is now empty.

# With 4 iron plates and 1 iron gear wheel, I now have enough materials to craft the Assembling Machine 1.

# Let's proceed to craft the Assembling Machine 1 now that I have sufficient resources.

craft_item(Prototype.AssemblingMachine1, quantity=1)  # Craft one assembling machine 1

# After crafting the assembling machine, I will check the updated inventory to confirm the new item.
print(f"Updated Inventory after crafting Assembling Machine: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after crafting the assembling machine.
